mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FSTVL_DATA ( FSTVL_NAME, OPAR, FSTVL_START_DATE, FSTVL_END_DATE, FSTVL_CO, MNNST_NAME, AUSPC_INSTT_NAME, SUPRT_INSTT_NAME, PHONE_NUMBER, HOMEPAGE_URL, RELATE_INFO, RDNMADR, LNMADR, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, REFERENCE_DATE, INSTT_CODE ) VALUES ( #{fstvlNm}, #{opar}, #{fstvlStartDate}, #{fstvlEndDate}, #{fstvlCo}, #{mnnstNm}, #{auspcInsttNm}, #{suprtInsttNm}, #{phoneNumber}, #{homepageUrl}, #{relateInfo}, #{rdnmadr}, #{lnmadr}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{referenceDate}, #{insttCode} )
